name: Ashes to Ashes (itch) (stev_annunz, JollyCoopCo)
description:
An action packed third-person shooter using bullets and hexes to seek undead revenge

Within the setting of a thrilling Wild West-inspired canyon, the player takes on the role of gunslinger Quinn del Ramo, who has risen from the grave to solve their own murder. Harness the powers of the spirit world to enhance your sharpshooting abilities and fight off the many forces trying to put you six feet under again.

Developed by Team Beans! Meet the team below!

Product Owner - Connor Evans

Lead Producer - Maliki Laforce

Technical Director - Steve Annunziato

Creative Director - John Wright

Lead Narrative Designer - Molli Shuker

Lead Sound Designer - Maxwell Van Walsen

Level Designer - Colton Lambert

Animator & General Artist - Maya D'Amico

Environment & Props Artist - Sarah Stearns

Concept & Character Artist - Alexis Sophabmixay

Generalist Programmer - Nicholas Sanguine

AI & Gameplay Programmer - Daniel VanRyn

Producer and QA Lead - Kendrick Ng-Yow

If you enjoyed the game, please consider following us for updates and add a comment below!
